events.name: Environmental justice issues in cobalt supply chain
events.wd_label: Environmental justice issues in cobalt supply chain
events.wd_description: Supply chain risks include sustainability challenges, political instability and corruption in countries with mineral deposits, and human rights or environmental justice concerns.
events.description: Supply chain risks include sustainability challenges, political instability and corruption in countries with mineral deposits, and human rights or environmental justice concerns.

events.name: Mineral extraction in the Global South for manufacturing of batteries and vehicles consumed in the Global North
events.wd_label: Mineral extraction in the Global South for manufacturing of batteries and vehicles consumed in the Global North
events.wd_description: Mineral extraction in the Global South for manufacturing of batteries and vehicles consumed in the Global North may replicate historical patterns of injustice and colonialism.
events.description: Mineral extraction in the Global South for manufacturing of batteries and vehicles consumed in the Global North may replicate historical patterns of injustice and colonialism.

events.name: Extreme weather events, geopolitical issues, international trade regulation, consolidation of supply chain companies into a few large corporations, and rapidly changing technologies
events.wd_label: Extreme weather events, geopolitical issues, international trade regulation, consolidation of supply chain companies into a few large corporations, and rapidly changing technologies
events.wd_description: These factors present additional challenges to building a resilient supply chain.
events.description: These factors present additional challenges to building a resilient supply chain.

events.name: The supply of critical minerals is concentrated in a few countries
events.wd_label: The supply of critical minerals is concentrated in a few countries
events.wd_description: The Democratic Republic of the Congo produced 74% of the world's cobalt in 2022.
events.description: The Democratic Republic of the Congo produced 74% of the world's cobalt in 2022.

events.name: Supply chain risks include sustainability challenges, political instability and corruption in countries with mineral deposits
events.wd_label: Supply chain risks include sustainability challenges, political instability and corruption in countries with mineral deposits
events.wd_description: These factors contribute to environmental justice issues.

events.name: The electric vehicle battery accounts for 30–40% of the overall cost of an electric vehicle
events.wd_label: The electric vehicle battery accounts for 30–40% of the overall cost of an electric vehicle
events.wd_description: This factor affects the affordability of electric vehicles.
events.description: This factor affects the affordability of electric vehicles.

events.name: End-of-Life Management Strategies
events.wd_description: Strategies for managing the end-of-life of EV batteries, including recycling, disposal, and recovery of valuable materials to minimize environmental impact.
events.description: Strategies for managing the end-of-life of EV batteries, including recycling, disposal, and recovery of valuable materials to minimize environmental impact.

events.name: Recycling Initiatives
events.wd_description: Efforts to increase the recycling rate of EV batteries to reduce environmental impact and meet market demand for critical materials.
events.description: Efforts to increase the recycling rate of EV batteries to reduce environmental impact and meet market demand for critical materials.

events.name: Disposal Techniques
events.wd_description: Methods for safely disposing of spent batteries to prevent environmental harm, emphasizing the importance of recycling over landfill disposal.
events.description: Methods for safely disposing of spent batteries to prevent environmental harm, emphasizing the importance of recycling over landfill disposal.

events.name: Material Recovery
events.wd_description: Processes to recover valuable materials from spent batteries, reducing the need for new raw materials and minimizing waste.
events.description: Processes to recover valuable materials from spent batteries, reducing the need for new raw materials and minimizing waste.
